content:
for DEQM the canonical is http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/STU3 The STU3 is a problem right? it should be http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm
url in STU3 artifacts
Yes, but I don't know whether the fact that we want to have two different IGs, one for each version, has any bearing on that.
US Core use the same canonical for FHIR STU3 and R4 need the [url]|[version] to resolve. though I have not seen that in action yet.
I will keep as is for now and make change before publish and after recon done.
